name: Unfezant
author: TOKIYA
flavor_text: Males have plumage on their heads. They will never let themselves feel close to anyone other than their Trainers.

ancient_trait.name: Δ  Evolution
ancient_trait.effect: You may play this card from your hand to evolve a Pokémon during your first turn or the turn you play that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Feather Dance
attacks.effect: During your next turn, each of this Pokémon’s attacks does 80 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Sky Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
